Text: Dear Jeff Life is always full of surprises I feel very lucky to have had the chance to know and appreciate you for who you are instead of for who people think you are Another turn in your life will be nothing less than another opportunity to continue to achieve all your goals This transition will be understood by your friends and family who will continue to support you Very friendly yours William

Dear Jeff It was a pleasure seeing you the other day I would be pleased to share the ranch with you and your son the weekend of Sept If these dates dont work out however feel free to give me alternate dates Best regards William
